original_text: The Lord came down on Mount Sinai, to the top of the mountain. And the Lord called Moses to the top of the mountain, and Moses went up.
korean_text: 여호와께서 시내 산 곧 그 산 꼭대기에 강림하시고 모세를 그리로 부르시니 모세가 올라가매

sentences.original_text: The Lord came down on Mount Sinai
to the top of the mountain
And the Lord called Moses to the top of the mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 모세를 산 꼭대기로 부르셨습니다
